<!-- dignified-python-review -->

## ✅ Dignified Python Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 06:51:20 PT

No violations found. All changes comply with dignified Python standards.

### Patterns Checked
✅ LBYL over EAFP - No exceptions used for control flow
✅ Frozen dataclasses - All dataclasses properly frozen
✅ Module-level imports - All imports at top of files
✅ Absolute imports - No relative imports detected
✅ No re-exports (__all__) - No __all__ modifications
✅ Exception handling - Exceptions only at error boundaries
✅ Path operations - All path checks follow LBYL pattern
✅ Keyword-only parameters - 5+ param function properly marked with *
✅ Lightweight __init__ - BranchSlugGenerator properly uses lightweight constructor

### Files Reviewed
- `src/erk/core/branch_slug_generator.py`: New file, all patterns compliant
- `src/erk/cli/commands/one_shot_dispatch.py`: 1 change, keyword-only args proper

- `src/erk/cli/commands/submit.py`: 1 change, slug generation compliant
- `src/erk/cli/commands/exec/scripts/plan_migrate_to_draft_pr.py`: 2 changes, imports compliant
- `tests/commands/one_shot/test_branch_name.py`: 6 changes, test updates compliant
- `tests/commands/submit/conftest.py`: 1 change, FakePromptExecutor injection proper
- `tests/core/test_branch_slug_generator.py`: New file, 16 tests all well-structured

---

### Activity Log
- **2026-02-22 06:51:20 PT**: No violations detected. All code adheres to dignified Python standards. BranchSlugGenerator properly uses lightweight constructor, LBYL error handling, and frozen dataclass. Tests properly use dependency injection with fakes.

<!-- dignified-code-simplifier-review -->

## ✅ Dignified Code Simplifier Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 06:51:25 PT

Found 0 violations across 9 files reviewed. All code complies with dignified-python standards.

### Patterns Checked
✅ **LBYL over EAFP** - No exception-based control flow detected
✅ **Pathlib always** - No os.path usage, all Path operations valid
✅ **Absolute imports only** - No relative imports
✅ **O(1) properties/magic methods** - No I/O or iteration in properties
✅ **Max 4 indentation levels** - All code within limits
✅ **Lightweight __init__** - New BranchSlugGenerator class follows pattern correctly
✅ **Frozen dataclasses** - BranchSlugResult properly frozen
✅ **No re-exports** - No __all__ exports
✅ **Variables declared close to use** - Good locality maintained

### Notable Compliant Patterns
- New `branch_slug_generator.py` module follows all dignified-python standards
- Proper frozen dataclass usage for `BranchSlugResult`
- Good LBYL validation in `_postprocess_slug` function
- Clean separation of concerns with helper functions

<!-- tripwires-review -->

## ✅ Tripwires Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 06:52:23 PT

No tripwire violations detected. All changes follow erk coding standards.

### Tripwires Triggered & Reviewed

Loaded category tripwires based on file changes:
- **architecture/** - Core module patterns (frozen dataclasses, dependency injection, discriminated unions)
- **cli/** - CLI command modifications (parameter threading, keyword-only parameters)
- **testing/** - Test coverage and fake usage patterns

### Tier 1: Mechanical Pattern Matches

✅ `subprocess\.run\(` - None found
✅ `os\.chdir\(` - None found
✅ `import time|time\.sleep\(|datetime\.now\(` - None found
✅ `Path\.home\(\)` - None found
✅ `gt (sync|submit|restack|create|modify)` - None found
✅ `monkeypatch\.|@patch` - None found (tests use FakePromptExecutor injection)
✅ `try:|except` in fake/dry_run - None found

### Tier 2: Semantic Pattern Matches

✅ **Frozen dataclass usage** - `BranchSlugResult` uses `@dataclass(frozen=True)` (compliant)
✅ **5+ parameter function** - `generate_branch_name` uses `*` for keyword-only parameters (compliant)
✅ **New business logic with tests** - `branch_slug_generator.py` + `test_branch_slug_generator.py` (14 tests added)
✅ **Dependency injection** - `BranchSlugGenerator.__init__(executor)` accepts gateway for testability
✅ **Test coverage for modified functions** - All callers of `generate_branch_name` updated with tests
✅ **FakePromptExecutor usage** - Tests use `simulated_prompt_output` parameter (compliant with gateway pattern)
✅ **Discriminated union pattern** - `BranchSlugResult` provides explicit success/error variants

### Files Reviewed

- `src/erk/core/branch_slug_generator.py`: 0 violations (new file, follows all standards)
- `src/erk/cli/commands/exec/scripts/plan_migrate_to_draft_pr.py`: 0 violations
- `src/erk/cli/commands/exec/scripts/plan_save.py`: 0 violations
- `src/erk/cli/commands/exec/scripts/setup_impl_from_issue.py`: 0 violations
- `src/erk/cli/commands/one_shot_dispatch.py`: 0 violations
- `src/erk/cli/commands/submit.py`: 0 violations
- `tests/core/test_branch_slug_generator.py`: 0 violations (new file, comprehensive coverage)
- `tests/commands/one_shot/test_branch_name.py`: 0 violations
- `tests/commands/submit/conftest.py`: 0 violations

---

### Activity Log
- **2026-02-22 06:52:23 PT**: No violations detected. Reviewed 9 files across architecture, CLI, and testing categories. All patterns compliant with dignified-python standards.
